summary: This mod replaces the default enchantments on your Nightingale Armor with other more suitable for a thief.
descriptionHtml:
Do you also think that the default enchantments on the Nightingale Armor suck? And that the already existing mods to improve your armor were too overpowered? Well I did anyway, but because I thought this was the best looking armor in the whole game, I decided to replace the enchantments with some other, better enchantments, especially suitable for thieves. The enchantments are:

Nightingale Boots:
Pickpocket success is 35% better.

Nightingale Gloves:
Lockpicking is 35% easier.

Nightingale Armor:
Carrying capacity increased by 50 points.

Nightingale Hood:
Prices are 20% better.

The enchantments are the same as on the Guild Master's Armor set, but because I like the look of the Nightingale armor, I'd prefer to wear this one.

If you'd rather have an better Nightingale Enchantment mod especially for Assassins, check out my other mod!
author: SvenYN
